title: ❗ Chaos or Order! The VS FAQ to guide you to your destiny
body:
[](https://d3pqmw6lh2nnpw.cloudfront.net/issue/en_US/cover/cover-desktop.jpg)

Greetings, Prospective Initiates of Order and Chaos!
 
Welcome to the Vs. Event. It’s a deathmatch between the angelic Riven and demonic Yasuo, as they vye for who will be the one to recreate a dying world in their image.
 
Just remember, cool edgelords don’t look at explosions...
 
https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lYCbVT87h5o/WS9JMw3_WuI/AAAAAAAAmNo/HJib9UM1OrI03mLqVwI5OyR4EO8hV8n5gCLcB/s640/yasuor.gif
 
With new stuff comes batches of new problems, but we can be your guiding light in a storm of chaos! If you’re confused as to any processes related to Missions, or what you can craft and buy, be sure to check out the [event site over here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/events/vs-2017) for more details.
 
We’ve also prepared a few FAQs below for you guys _in addition_ to the microsite!  If you find that your question isn’t answered there, just comment below and we’ll help out. :)
 
**FAQ’s**

>**I don't have any new missions yet, what's up?**

New missions should refresh around 11:00am Pacific for all regions.

>**What champions can use the Vs. Borders?**

The Nightbringer Yasuo and Dawnbringer Riven Borders are exclusive to those skins.  The border will **not** show on other champions or skins.  You do not have to equip the border icon for the border to show!

>**If I unlock the border now, do I still keep it if I buy the skin a year later?**

Yes!  The border is tied to the icon, and will stay with you after the Vs. event ends.
 
> **“How come I can’t complete ‘One Blade, One Purpose’ / ‘Awakening’?”**

Remember that you need to equip a Chaos or Order icon respectively to complete those Missions, and after you do either the Order or Chaos Mission, you can’t do the Mission for the opposing side until the next day.
 

>**“When I bought my pass, I didn’t get any Hextech shards for the Ward Skin listed, where’d it go?”**

The Ward Skin is automatically and permanently unlocked upon purchasing a Pass, so you don’t have to craft that.
 
>**Does the Chaos Pass double Order Token drops or vice versa?**

The Chaos Pass will only double Chaos token drops, and the Order pass will only double Order token drops


>**Do I need to complete the Novice missions obtained from buying the pass in order to progress on the Master Missions?**

No, those Mission lines are completely separate. Instead of one unlocking the other, look at them like an easier quest line, and a harder one.
 

>**People keep banning Yasuo and Riven! I can’t complete some of my Missions!”**

Don’t worry, if the champ you need keeps getting banned, you can play any mode where there are no bans! This includes thing Normal Blind Pick, Co-Op vs. AI, and even ARAM, though remember selection there is random. 
 
 
>**“Can I get the new skins from Tokens or Mission Rewards?”**

The Dawnbringer and Nightbringer skins are not available through Tokens or Missions.
 
>**“Will my emotes from my icons last after the event?”**

All emotes tied to icons in this event are temporary and  will be deactivated at the end, but you get to keep the icon!
 
>**“I got the X icon, but I don’t have the border for my new skin!”**

 In order to get the border for either Nightbringer or Dawnbringer, you must craft the Nightbringer or Dawnbringer Borders. You will receive an icon along with this, but the other crafted icons and icons earned from “In the Beginning…” will not grant the border.
 
 
>**“When I opened one of my crafted Orbs I didn’t get anything / my client crashed and ate it! What happened!??”**

Don’t worry, just let us know in the comments below! We’ll take a look in your account and see what happened.
 
>**“But how come I didn’t get a Soulstealer Vayne / Hextech Annie Shard!?”**

You’re guaranteed one Legacy Skin shard from Orbs, but there’s only a chance you’ll get any extra drops like those skin shards or Gemstones.
 
>**What will happen to Tokens that I don’t use?**

Until the 24th of July, players can redeem 10 tokens for 10 Blue essence in Hextech. After that, tokens will expire from your inventory.
 
>**Ok, how about the Orbs that I craft?”**

The Orbs you get from either side will still open after the 24th of July, but they will not include Tokens as a potential drop.

replies.body: What's up with the "**!**"
To catch your attention.  Did it work?  :)

So you're saying I can use Co-op Vs AI mode to complete my Yasuo/Riven specific missions on the passes? :O
Thank god! I wanted the wards, but don't play those champs - so I was afraid to ruin someones game haha
Depends on what the specific mission says.  Your first mission says to win any _matchmade_ game.  Technically, AI vs. Coop is matchmade because you're queueing up with others.  :D

First i went on chaos side and did the missions got 20 tokens, but i wanted order so 24h after i did the order missions and also got 20 but does this mean i screwed up changing side cause i lost 20 tokens?
So, if I unlock this boarder, but I don't spend money to obtain this skin, I can't in any way use the boarder?

You should be okay!  As long as it's unlocked during the event, the border should appear if you unlock the skin later!

Can you please better explain how the Victor’s Emblem works?

- when I get the Victor’s Emblem, I can't do anything with it
- at the end of the event, Victor’s Emblem will be craftable into one of these two icons, depending on which side won

https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qo76vTf8wOk/WS9DHzVkkzI/AAAAAAABDuI/BXhrAKvmuLk4tn7BPjWbarrtyxLwi5FRACLcB/s1600/fc42083b7079ae68.jpg

https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-e5YCSodc-WQ/WS9DHrqKvQI/AAAAAAABDt4/bHs_cPtB_PIxTcIvUd5nICH2AEgUbFozQCLcB/s1600/8900cfa59b38e074.jpg

How often is the event page updated with the current faction score?

Thanks!
Yup!  Once you get the emblem, it will still need to be crafted!  The[ event site](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/events/vs-2017) should actively update as the war continues onwards.

Sigh, I'll never have that Riven icon, it's the only thing I really wanted from this event T_T

(no chance Order can win in this event)
TBH Half of Riven's icons look like they were meant {{champion:10}}. Which reminds me we still haven't gotten a {{champion:10}} vs {{champion:25}} event.
Can i actually get the novice and the master mision lines without buying them?? It would be good, not everyone can spend that much muny on da game... {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Those novice and master missions are only available through the Order and Chaos passes. You can still get the rewards through the regular daily missions though without having the buy the passes!

Am i forced to buy rp so i can buy Tokens to get the border or can i get 280 tokens with only missions??????
example i complete missions and now i have 70 tokens can i get 280 tokens before the event is done or am i forced to buy rp just to get the border
Riot you will start to lose players if you keep going like this first its chroma skins and now missions that you have to pay for to get anything out of?
we just want our border's  without having to pay {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}}
Without paying a single cent, you can get about 340 tokens (as long as my math was right) which are enough to get the Border Icon.

Is it necessary to do the quests for every single day of the week of the event inorder to acquire atleast 280 tokens? Sometimes real life can get in the way...

Also for the 280 token border icon, is this a border and a summoner icon in one?

Yeeaaaa I understand real life getting in the way. I've been unfortunate enough that my in-laws are visiting **RIGHT** through the entire event, so it's been pretty hard for me to complete most of the missions. If you've missed missions, the total amount of tokens you can get for free is reduced, but keep in mind these are free missions and icons which are in no way required to play the game.

That border icon is, in fact, a border and summoner icon in one! You DO need to have the Nightbringer or Dawnbringer skin for the border to show up though.

I have a question about tokens.

Based on Red comments and the FAQ, you're able to earn everything during the event naturally.

Let's take Order's unique loot for example:
Dawnbringer Riven Icon and Border - 280 tokens.
Orb of Order - 140 tokens.
Daybreak Icon with Event Emote - 100 tokens.
Dawnblade Icon 80 tokens.

That's 600 tokens needed for all the unique loot of one side. There's naturally Chaos as well, so to complete the event, you need 1200 tokens.

The problem here is that you get 20 tokens a day. Meaning if you earned 20 tokens a day for 14 days (two weeks), then at best you could get 280 tokens.
So instead of being able to complete the event and earn all of the unique loot for at least one side, you can instead choose only a couple, or one of the rewards.

Is this correct? I'm sorely disappointed if that's the case. Sure, I can understand not getting to have the benefits of both sides, and players should be rewarded for supporting their favorite side, but 20 tokens a day will not get a person through even one side of the event.

I would appreciate any discussion or help with this.

There are extra ways to get those tokens besides the daily missions! You can purchase the tokens by themselves in the store, but a better way of getting them would be by grabbing the Order/Chaos Passes in the shop. Those passes will give you access to bonus mission lines, as well as increasing the rate at which you get those tokens too.

of course riot cant add something awsome like missions without the player having to pay to be able to get everything, cause ya know playing the game isnt enough proof of worth. its fucking chromas all over again. 
i really hope that after this stupid event missions will be player friendly and not just another micro-transaction to the apparently money starved riot.
Just playing the game is definitely not enough proof of worth... If you play the game, you COST them money.
How many missions can i do per day?
3, then u have to wait till the other day OR buy the chaos/order pass 4 more misiounz{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

If my only goal is Hextech Annie and everything else has microscopic value, assuming I have infinite chests but no keys, should I spend my tokens on orbs or hextech keys?

Keys (40 each): 3.5 chances at a gemstone or hextech annie shard.
Orb (140 each): 1 chance to get a chance for 2 gemstones or the hextech annie shard directly (or more shards towards another orb).

The way you've advertised it, and since orbs are special limited time content, it seems like orbs would be the better choice. But it's also possible that the chance for the bonus drop multiplied by the chance of that being a gemstone or Annie shard is so small that I'd be better off just buying way more keys to use up surplus chests for more drop chances.

edit: if these numbers
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/BaLLpviT-i-opened-100-orbs-on-pbe-to-test-the-bonus-drop-rates-gemshextech-skins-for-the-upcoming-vs-event?show=new
are correct, it would mean that I'm actually better off buying keys because the droprate for gems actually is much worse than the odds of getting a single gem from they keys I could instead get from my tokens. Seems kinda dumb to me that you guys would fawn over the special droprates of gemstones in these orbs and it turns out they're a trap option if you care about those drops =\

I can't give out the exact droprates, but if your end goal is Hextech Annie I would say you've got much greater odds of getting her via the Order Orbs. You have a 50% chance at getting bonus loot from orbs, and that bonus loot has a chance to be 2 gemstones or the Hextech Annie Shard herself!

May the odds be ever in your favor!

It seems you have just given me bad advice. I've looked over a few loot videos and some other accounts of droprates and I'd strongly urge you to look over my math and let me know if I've missed something..

It appears that gemstone droprate for orbs is around 2 per 50 which averages out to the same you'd get from normal hextech chests (estimated at 1 in 25 for a single gemstone).
Token return from orbs seems to be around 12 per orb which effectively reduces their net cost to 128 tokens per orb, so I can still get more than 3 keys for that price.
The odds of directly getting the shard appears to be less than 1 in 100 orbs, so it probably doesn't make up the difference even before considering that hextech chests also have a small chance of getting the shard directly.

another 100 orb sample that supports the hypothetical average of 2 gems every 50 orbs and a less than 1% chance of getting the shard directly: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xUbXa_796oY

Do you see any errors in my math?

EDIT: Your math may be on point for a sample size of 100 orbs, but overall that's a really small sample size. Also, in your math you're neglecting the fact that Order Orbs have a chance of giving you Hextech Annie outright, without having to spend your gemstones. 

Also, I'm sorry if you took my response as telling you that you need to buy orbs and not keys. That was not my intention. You asked which option gave you a higher chance of getting Hextech Annie, which orbs **do** still have a higher chance of getting you that skin, since normal chests drop that skin at a much much lower rate. Essentially with orbs, you have multiple chances to get the skin. You could get bonus gemstones drops, or the skin itself.

In the long run, it's completely up to you how you spend those tokens!

You're now giving conflicting information and making this very frustrating for me. I don't like poring over statistics to try to figure out if these orbs are a good deal or not but Riot isn't giving enough information on droprates and their deals for gemstones have been deceptively poor in the past so I can't just assume that if it drops a gemstone it must be a good deal for getting gemstones.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=QEXq3Jr3,comment-id=005d000000000000,timestamp=2017-06-18T02:28:44.647+0000)
>
> Your math may be on point for a sample size of 100 orbs, but overall that's a really small sample size.

Well I'm not going to spend 200 dollars on orbs to get a better sample size and Riot doesn't give a clear indication of what the droprates are for these RNG boxes, so I can either look at poor sample sizes or ask you directly.
>Also, in your math you're neglecting the fact that Order Orbs have a chance of giving you Hextech Annie outright, without having to spend your gemstones. 

I did not neglect it, I've looked at several large sample sizes and never seen it drop, so my best guess is that the odds of it dropping are very small, much less than 1%, and thus it is not worth considering compared to the rate of gemstone drops
> Also, I'm sorry if you took my response as telling you that you need to buy orbs and not keys. That was not my intention.

I don't think you're telling me what I should do, I gave a very specific set of assumptions that don't apply to every player. I just want to know if orbs will get me more, the same amount, or less progress on average towards a Hextech Annie because there are a lot of variables left open by Riot that could mean orbs are GREAT for gemstones or GARBAGE for gemstones. I understand that I can follow your advice or ignore your advice. It's just frustrating because it seems like your advice might be the opposite of what I want.
> normal chests can **NOT** drop that skin.

Normal chests **CAN** drop Hextech Annie directly, everyone knows this. It even happened to Trick2G on stream. This is one of the reasons I can't simply take you at your word that orbs are really a good use of tokens.

I'm can't really debate drop rates or the best way of getting a very specific item. In your first post, you were asking our personal opinion on what the best way to get Hextech Annie would be, and I would honestly still stand by the Orb choice. 

Again, in the long run, it's your decision to choose how to spend those tokens. I was simply stating my personal thoughts on which method would be better.

Hi
Buying tokens should be the best way to get Hextech Annie skin (or Soulstealer Vayne). The chance you get bonus drop is 50%  and there are 3 possibilities, so this means you have 16% chance to get that skin, however there is a  84% you don't get it (50% for nothing, and 2x 16% for the other 2 rewards) . Normal chests are probably the worst way, since there are over 800 skins, which means the chance would be 0.125%.
The chance to get gemstones from chest is around 1/30 = 3.33% + the fact that you need 10 of them so I would say he actually gave you good advice but you were just unlucky.

I am not receiving any quest for past few days, what's wrong? :(
Sometimes you might need to close and reopen the client to refresh your missions. I double checked your account and you should have Awakened and One Blade, One Purpose currently.
Can i keep the orbs if i dont want to open?maybe i will open it next year XP
As far as I know those orbs shouldn't expire. Even if the event ends, you'll still be able to open any leftover orbs you might have.
So just to clear things up: unopened orbs won't expire, but unused tokens will, right?

The tokens will expire on 7/24/17 @ 23:59 PT, but you will still have a chance to use them before they go away! Once the event is over, you can craft any leftover tokens into blue essence at a rate of 10 tokens = 10 Blue Essence. 

Feel free to reach back out if you have other questions, but you might find the answers on the [**VS Event Site**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/events/vs-2017) too!

As a follow up question to this, you'll still be able to spend tokens in the store once the event ends, right? Like, if I wait until 7/01/17 to buy my rewards, I'm not left *only* crafting them into spare key frags and can still go for things like the borders?
You won't be able to craft those tokens into items once the event is over. You will be able to convert them to essence until 7/24/17 23:59 PT, but not any of the event items.
Please help! Stuck with only 3 missions and I have started when it first came out.  I have not received new missions in the past two days
Does the master and novice questline refresh daily?
Do I need a key or dust to open Legacy skin shard that is acquired from Orbs?
You will still need to use essence to activate those skins shards that you get from orbs!
Dumb and unfair. Should be able to get the other icon if you chose wrong, with ip or seomthing.

Hey there, I'd like to help you out but I'm not sure what you mean.  Which icons specifically are you talking about?  Give me the scoop on what happened exactly, so I can see if there's anything we can do!
